news1.title: Woman Up: It's about time we redefine what
news1.desc: Delaware Democrat Sarah McBride, who in 2020 became the nation’s first openly transgender state senator, is setting out to make history again — this time as the first out transgender person elected to Congress.

news2.title: Camping Up: It's about time we redefine what
news2.desc: A Christian-owned wellness center, Braidwood, is exempted from the federal law prohibiting employers from discriminating on the basis of sexual orientation and gender identity, a federal appeals court ruled last week.
